General.Name: Global Oriental Bhd
General.Description: Global Oriental Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the development of properties primarily in Malaysia. Its Property Development segment develops residential and commercial properties, as well as engage in other construction activities. Its Trading and Distribution segment trades in and distributes housewares and related products, such as glass and ceramic dinnerware, cookware, tableware, and others. The company's Others segment engages in retail businesses; and construction of property development projects and other construction activities, and others. It also provides treasury services; and operates book stores and cafes. The company was formerly known as Equine Capital Berhad and changed its name to Global Oriental Berhad in September 2012. Global Oriental Berhad was founded in 1992 and is based in Seri Kembangan, Malaysia.
